about_the_game:
Aibius is proud to present music tracks for exofighters to take down hordes of dinosaurs.

The Exoprimal Special Soundtrack includes 21 tracks of bone-crunching guitars and pulse-pounding electronic bliss. The soundtrack features music from acclaimed Capcom artists Casey Edwards & Jeff Rona (Devil May Cry 5), Shusaku Uchiyama (Resident Evil series), and more!

The dynamic score has been re-edited by the Capcom Sound Team to provide an optimal Exoprimal album listening experience.
detailed_description:
Aibius is proud to present music tracks for exofighters to take down hordes of dinosaurs.

The Exoprimal Special Soundtrack includes 21 tracks of bone-crunching guitars and pulse-pounding electronic bliss. The soundtrack features music from acclaimed Capcom artists Casey Edwards & Jeff Rona (Devil May Cry 5), Shusaku Uchiyama (Resident Evil series), and more!

The dynamic score has been re-edited by the Capcom Sound Team to provide an optimal Exoprimal album listening experience.

Online Play
* A Capcom ID and internet connection is required to play this game.
* For information on the services related to Capcom ID and how to use it, please visit the official Capcom ID website cid.capcom.com. Please note that there may be cases wherein use of Capcom ID is age-restricted.
* Capcom may temporarily suspend online services in the event of unforeseen circumstances.
name: Exoprimal Special Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 697 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3 (V0) + AAC (VBR) / FLAC (16-bit)
